messages.title: THE GENERAL ELECTION
messages.content: A strong and effective voice for Wycombe

messages.title: YOUR LABOUR OPPOSITION
messages.content: Opposed more affordable homes on the reserve list sites and delayed a project promising jobs and prosperity. They are not right for Wycombe.

messages.title: YOUR CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION
messages.content: The Conservatives have a strong record on the economy and the clear plan to secure Britain's future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting the long-term economic plan. Creating new jobs in the area.
Freezing council tax. Investing in frontline services.
Support for affordable homes on the reserve list sites.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you have any matters you would like to discuss or if you are unsure who to vote for.

issues.economy: Cutting the deficit, creating more jobs in the area, an economy in which everyone benefits.
issues.education: Freezing council tax and investing in frontline services demonstrates our commitment to funding education.
issues.health: Freezing council tax and investing in frontline services demonstrates our commitment to funding healthcare.
issues.socialWelfare: Freezing council tax and investing in frontline services demonstrates our commitment to social welfare.

housing.content: Support for affordable homes on the reserve list sites.
